Data Fields
rtc_alarm_t Struct Reference
Real Time Clock (RTC)

RTC Alarm including Time and Alarm Type. More...

#include <rtc.h>

Collaboration diagram for rtc_alarm_t:

Detailed Description

This structure is used to read and write the RTC alarm using the rtc_ioctl() function.

Data Fields

rtc_time_t time
 The time for the alarm.
 
uint8_t type
 The type of alarm (rtc_alarm_type_t)
